data.title: Klingspor Museum (Offenbach am Main)
data.meta_description: Klingspor Museum is a museum in Offenbach am Main. View visitor information, information about the collection and read reviews.
data.text:
The Klingspor Museum in Offenbach am Main is a unique institution dedicated to modern and contemporary book and lettering art. The museum's collection is based on the private collection of Karl Klingspor, a type foundry operator. This makes it a special destination for those interested in typography, graphic design, and book art.

Collection of the Klingspor Museum

The Klingspor Museum boasts a collection of approximately 80,000 works of art. These include artist books, painter books, press prints, type samples, print graphics, calligraphies, children's books, and letter carpets from the 20th and 21st centuries. This diverse collection offers a comprehensive overview of modern and contemporary book and lettering art, making it a fascinating destination for art enthusiasts.
